TopicTitle: The one thing that really grinds your gears.

Articles.Content: when some one does tell you the time for a certain event.
when ppl are stupid to be funny. I HATE THAT. (I could rant for 20 pages about it)

Brillant ideas that comes juuuust as you're about to fall asleep, then you have to decide if you should go to sleep and risk losing the idea, or get up, write it out, and not fall back asleep until later

Why not dream about that idea, or better yet, have a LUCID dream about that idea?

Why not dream about that idea, or better yet, have a LUCID dream about that idea?

If I was that clever, I would.

Here's one for everyone - Deadlines. I love 'em. I especially love the whooshing noise they make as they fly past.

Brillant ideas that comes juuuust as you're about to fall asleep, then you have to decide if you should go to sleep and risk losing the idea, or get up, write it out, and not fall back asleep until later

Nice to know i'm not the only one.
When you find out you ,and another person are the only people to take down a computer lab when no one else shows up except the teacher.

Nice to know i'm not the only one.

same for me to!
when you need more time ,but you can have time.

I tried so hard to forget that. WHY DO YOU DO THIS!?

I don't get it, what are those forums about?
when you want to forget something but you can't.

Bullies of any form. My entire life has been full of them, and I completely believe that they are sub-humans unworthy of their continued existence.

Bullies? Check.

Constant desparation for love, affection, and respect? Check.

Nights spent rebuilding your shattered heart? Check.

Trust me, I know. I've been terrorized by them. I'm a guy and I often hug pillows at night to comfort myself and keep myself from crying. I've created an entire imaginary world/utopia to help myself cope.
When people still think the world is flat.
People who claim horoscopes and the zodiac are fact based methods of decision making. You're going to face challenges every day, get used to it.
When you dont know kerbish.

Bullies? Check.

Constant desparation for love, affection, and respect? Check.

Nights spent rebuilding your shattered heart? Check.

Trust me, I know. I've been terrorized by them. I'm a guy and I often hug pillows at night to comfort myself and keep myself from crying. I've created an entire imaginary world/utopia to help myself cope.

I was once suicidal becouse of bullies THANK GOD I DIDN"T DO IT!!

When someone won't let you explan what REALLY happend becouse they're to busy yelling at you

and people who get angry becouse you can't spell and just have all round TERRIBLE grammar.

Another thing that grinds my gears: People who worship celebrities instead of people who actually matter and who actually changed the world. Like Neil Armstrong, Nikola Tesla, Stephen Hawking, Issac Newton, etc..

Fly me to the Mun...

Let me play among the Kerbals

A'let me dance, on a' Jool and a' Duna

Innnn other words...

we're

all

Screwed!
When you get woona stuck in your vocabulary instead of moon or mun.
When for some reason, my IP address was banned from the PfL IRC chat. Why? Why?
When you learn that your favorite is down.
Losing something that was nearly your only reason to keep going as imaginative and happy as you know you can be.

Bullies are pigs who are jealous that they can't change the world by being brutes.

In other words: Bullies.

Edited June 15, 2013 by Rainbowtrout

Same here.

That's one of the best coping mechanisms, I've found. and it helps me exercise my creative side, which is nice, too.
I've somehow made three!
When something that seems so harmless ends.
